page.title: 10HAPPENINGS
page.content: The organ has been repaired.The vicar held a service and after the service there was a barbeque.The Church has two new bells in memory of Lord Ancaster.They were engraved.We went round to see the bells.They were hung up in May.When you touch you get a silvery effect on your hand.In March there was a flag pole put up.Some of us saw the flag pole being put up at the side of the Church.The men nearly dropped it from the top of the tower but they finally got it up.When we got the bells the flag was flying in memory of Lord Ancaster.It was flying at half mast.Across the road from the School,some new steps have been built.It is to help anyone who wants to put a notice on the Parish notice board.A garden fete was held on the lawn of Peter Bee's house.The village hall was recently decorated.
